description:
Jeanne d`Arc is the Ruler-class Servant, tasked with ensuring that the Holy Grail War proceeds as intended. She`s a Catholic saint born in Domrémy, France, and the heroine of France who liberated Orléans in the Hundred Years` War.
In anime, she possessed the body of a French girl named Laeticia, whose physique, personality and magical energy were compatible with hers. She has two types of Command Spells - regular ones under her gauntlet, and the ones granting her ability to command other Servants during the Great Holy Grail War on her back.
Source: TYPE-MOON Wiki
name: Jeanne d`Arc
